notesStmt.note: Ten leaves are missing at the beginning. One leaf is missing after folio 168 and 176. A number of leaves are more or less damaged.
Yitsḥaḳ ben Yefet he-ḥazan: his name inscribed in the colophon, on folio 218r.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary of Tanḥum Yerushalmi on Ecclesiastes, in Arabic, with the Hebrew text embodied.
